tasks.label: Run unittest with coverage and open report
args: import coverage, webbrowser, os; cov=coverage.Coverage(); cov.start(); import unittest; unittest.TextTestRunner().run(unittest.defaultTestLoader.discover('.')); cov.stop(); cov.save(); cov.html_report(directory='htmlcov'); webbrowser.open('file://' + os.path.abspath('htmlcov/index.html'))
